column1: Baby Barnaby's////This breakfast place is quaint and yummy. They offer good choices for standard breakfast fare. I got the breakfast plate (2 eggs
column2: with choice of fried potatos or grits
column4: and biscuit or bread). I ordered this with scrambled eggs
column7: and biscuits. The potatos were nicely crispy and the biscuit were flaky. I recommend adding jam to this. Overall a good breakfast. I also recommend trying the fresh-pressed orange juice. It's refreshing and delicious.
